skills.name: Install MobX
skills.pattern: npm install mobx mobx-react-lite

skills.name: makeObservable
skills.pattern: class Store { count = 0; constructor() { makeObservable(this, { count: observable, increment: action }) } }

skills.name: makeAutoObservable
skills.pattern: class Store { count = 0; constructor() { makeAutoObservable(this) } }

skills.name: observable
skills.pattern: import { observable } from 'mobx'; const state = observable({ count: 0 })

skills.name: Observable Array
skills.pattern: class Store { items = []; constructor() { makeAutoObservable(this) } }

skills.name: Observable Map
skills.pattern: const users = observable.map()

skills.name: action
skills.pattern: increment = action(() => { this.count++ })

skills.name: Action Method
skills.pattern: increment() { this.count++ } // auto with makeAutoObservable

skills.name: runInAction
skills.pattern: runInAction(() => { this.user = data; this.loading = false })

skills.name: flow
skills.pattern: fetchUser = flow(function* () { const data = yield fetch('/api/user'); this.user = data })

skills.name: computed
skills.pattern: get total() { return this.items.reduce((sum, i) => sum + i.price, 0) }

skills.name: Computed Cache
skills.pattern: Computed values are cached and only recompute when dependencies change

skills.name: autorun
skills.pattern: autorun(() => { console.log('Count:', store.count) })

skills.name: reaction
skills.pattern: reaction(() => store.count, (count) => { console.log('Count changed:', count) })

skills.name: when
skills.pattern: when(() => store.isReady, () => { console.log('Ready!') })

skills.name: observer
skills.pattern:
import { observer } from 'mobx-react-lite'; const Counter = observer(() =>
{store.count}
)

skills.name: Observer Component
skills.pattern: import { Observer } from 'mobx-react-lite'; {() => {store.count}}

skills.name: useLocalObservable
skills.pattern: const store = useLocalObservable(() => ({ count: 0, increment() { this.count++ } }))

skills.name: Store Context
skills.pattern: const StoreContext = createContext(store); const useStore = () => useContext(StoreContext)

skills.name: Root Store
skills.pattern: class RootStore { userStore = new UserStore(this); cartStore = new CartStore(this) }

skills.name: Strict Mode
skills.pattern: configure({ enforceActions: 'always' })

skills.name: Computed Requires
skills.pattern: configure({ computedRequiresReaction: true })

skills.name: mobx-persist-store
skills.pattern: npm install mobx-persist-store; makePersistable(this, { name: 'Store', properties: ['count'], storage: window.localStorage })

skills.name: Async Pattern
skills.pattern: class Store { data = null; loading = false; async fetchData() { this.loading = true; const data = await api.get(); runInAction(() => { this.data = data; this.loading = false }) } }

skills.name: AbortController
skills.pattern: Use AbortController with fetch and check this.disposed in runInAction

skills.name: Trace
skills.pattern: import { trace } from 'mobx'; trace(true) // in computed/reaction

skills.name: Spy
skills.pattern: spy((event) => { console.log(event) })

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.pattern: class Store { count: number = 0; constructor() { makeAutoObservable(this) } }

skills.name: Test Store
skills.pattern: const store = new Store(); store.increment(); expect(store.count).toBe(1)

skills.name: MobX DevTools
skills.pattern: MobX Developer Tools browser extension for debugging
